protection.translation[0].definitions[0]: when someone or something is protected

protection.translation[0].definitions[1]: Magee pulled up his collar as protection against the breeze.
protection.translation[0].definitions[2]: the promise of payment from an insurance company if something bad happens

protection.translation[0].note_box[0].se: give/provide protection

need protection

good protection

adequate protection

complete protection

data protection
